ComicInfo.Title: Volume Two
ComicInfo.Series: Edgar Allan Poe's Snifter of Terror
ComicInfo.Summary:
AHOY Comics' snarky anthology-slash-desecration of Edgar Allan Poe returns for a second volume, featuring more of the popular "Monster Serials" by Mark Russell (SECOND COMING) and Peter Snejbjerg (The Books of Magic), as well as Dean Motter and Alex Ogle's ultimate Poe mashup, "The Tell-Tale Black Cask of Usher." Plus more than a dozen additional comics stories, a generous selection of short "Poe and the Black Cat" strips by Hunt Emerson, and horrific bonus prose stories and poetry, too.
*Notes:* The cover is a homage of the cover of Action Comics #1.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-08 23:11:37. [CVDB802997]
ComicInfo.Writer: Hunt Emerson, Katherine Babcock, Mark Russell, Scott Morse, Tom Peyer
ComicInfo.Penciller: Carol Lay, Greg Scott, Hunt Emerson, Peter Snejbjerg, Hunt Emerson, Peter Snejbjerg
ComicInfo.Inker: Carol Lay, Greg Scott, Hunt Emerson, Peter Snejbjerg, Hunt Emerson, Peter Snejbjerg
